module.name: Conferences
module.description: Allow creation of conference rooms where multiple people can talk together
module.changelog: *13.0.16* FREEPBX-11233 *13.0.15* FREEPBX-11121 *13.0.14* FREEPBX-11167 *13.0.13* FREEPBX-10990 *13.0.12* FREEPBX-9044 *13.0.11* Conference menu options need to line up to what is in the voice prompt *13.0.10* Sliding bootnav *13.0.9* FREEPBX-10273 fall back on pin entry if there is no pin on users but there is on admin *13.0.8* FREEPBX-10273 make sure at least one pin is set *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10273 dont allow blank pins *13.0.5* FREEPBX-9915 - Install issues. *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9850 dont reset the invalid pin count on an invalid pin *13.0.3* Fix undefined indexes when searching for conferences globally *13.0.2.4* Compatibility fix *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha2* FREEPBX-9467 Added search hooks *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Changes *12.0.11* Cleanup
